title: [GAMEPLAY] Minor Bug - Switching 'Modes' with DJ Sona
body:
When switching from ethereal to kinetic, sometimes the purple and blue 'mask' that she is wearing in the more 'chill' mode carries over for a few seconds. Again, it's not a large bug, but it can be a little confusing. To clarify, the mask is the only thing that does not change, and after about 4 seconds it changes back to normal.

If you need an example, let me know and I'll snap one in game. I'm sure I'm not the only person with this problem.

replies.body:
No problem! It's just something I've noticed. The other bugs that I have reported these past few days are way more important. Please look into those as well :)

Thanks,
BWG.

Hey BWG Smexy! 

Thanks for the report! This is a larger issue that we're aware of, but isn't something that's a quick fix. D: We're still looking into it!
